content.prompt: Studies of the Big Five personality traits have revealed that

choices.label: most of the traits show little validity across cultures
people show fairly high levels of stability in the traits from year to year
measurement of the traits is highly reliable when psychologists use projective tests
scores on all five traits are highly intercorrelated

topic.text: 4.5: Social-Cognitive and Trait Theories of Personality

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
